name: Wallace & Gromit's Grand Adventures Episode 2 - The Last Resort
name_original: Wallace & Gromit's Grand Adventures Episode 2 - The Last Resort
description:
Wallace & Gromit's Grand Adventures Episode 2 - The Last Resort is an adventure game developed by Telltale Games. It was originally released in 2009. It was published by Telltale Games. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
You can play Wallace & Gromit's Grand Adventures Episode 2 - The Last Resort on iOS, Xbox 360 and PC.
